member.name: D3D12_CLEAR_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies what to clear from the depth stencil view.

member.name: D3D12_CLEAR_FLAGS.D3D12_CLEAR_FLAG_DEPTH
member.summary: Indicates the depth buffer should be cleared.

member.name: D3D12_CLEAR_FLAGS.D3D12_CLEAR_FLAG_STENCIL
member.summary: Indicates the stencil buffer should be cleared.
